shadow-bullet.name: Shadow Bullet

special: Can add 1 additional D8 for every 2 additional VS spent
Example: 5 VS spent would mean damage roll is 4D8 + AST

shadow-bullet.description: Condense darkness into a projectile that tears through flesh and leaves cold numbness in its wake. 2D8 + AST Modifier. Range: 40 ft. Can Add 1 Additional D8 for Every 2 additional VS spent.

cloak-of-shadows.name: Cloak of Shadows

special: Bright light ends the effect early

cloak-of-shadows.description: Pull darkness around yourself like a garment. Light slides away from you, and your outline blurs. Caster gains +2 D20 on stealth-related rolls and +1 D20 on defensive rolls. Duration: 10 minutes. Bright light ends the effect early.

darken.name: Darken

special: Create a 20 ft. radius of darkness centered on a point
Mundane light sources are extinguished
Magical light sources are suppressed for the duration

darken.description: Extinguish light sources and spread darkness across an area. Torches gutter, lanterns die, and even magical light dims. Create a 20 ft. radius of darkness centered on a point within 30 ft. Mundane light sources are extinguished. Magical light sources are suppressed for the duration. Duration: 5 minutes.

shadow-step.name: Shadow Step

special: Teleport up to 40 ft. between two areas of dim light or darkness
Cannot be targeted by attacks of opportunity during this movement

shadow-step.description: Sink into one shadow and emerge from another. For a moment, you exist only as darkness moving through darkness. Teleport up to 40 ft. between two areas of dim light or darkness. You cannot be targeted by attacks of opportunity during this movement.
shadow-step.notes: Requires dim light or darkness at both origin and destination

umbral-lash.name: Umbral Lash

diceModifiers.duration: until end of target's next turn

special: Target suffers -1 D20 on their next attack roll as creeping cold numbs their limbs

umbral-lash.description: Command your own shadow to strike. It stretches impossibly, its edges sharp as razors, and rakes across your foe. 3D10 + AST Modifier. Target suffers -1 D20 on their next attack roll as creeping cold numbs their limbs. Range: 25 ft.

assassins-veil.name: Assassin's Veil

grants: Invisible while in dim light or darkness
special: First attack made while invisible deals +3D12 damage and automatically crits if it hits
Effect ends after attacking or entering bright light
AP price can be reduced to a minimum of 1 by spending additional VS

assassins-veil.description: Become one with the darkness. While in shadow, you are nearly impossible to detect, and your first strike carries the weight of the void. Caster becomes invisible while in dim light or darkness. First attack made while invisible deals +3D12 damage and automatically crits if it hits. The effect ends after attacking or entering bright light. Duration: 1 hour or until triggered. Note: AP Price can be reduced to a minimum of 1 by spending additional VS.
assassins-veil.notes: Powerful stealth setup with critical strike payoff

summon-shade.name: Summon Shade

creature.name: Shade

attacks.name: Umbral Rake
attacks.special: Attacks from darkness gain +2 D20 to hit

passives: Attacks from darkness gain +2 D20 to hit
Can use Shadow Step once per round (no cost)
Takes double damage from radiant/light sources

summon-shade.description: Tear a fragment of living darkness from the void. It stalks your enemies with silent hunger, striking from angles that shouldn't exist. Summon a Shade that acts on your turn. Duration: 5 rounds or until destroyed.

ebon-annihilation.name: Ebon Annihilation

special: Half physical damage, half Sanity damage
If target is in dim light or darkness, damage dice are maximized (no roll, take highest possible)

ebon-annihilation.description: Open yourself fully to the void and become a conduit for absolute darkness. Shadows in the area surge toward your target, tearing at body and soul alike. 6D12 + AST Modifier. Half physical damage, half Sanity damage. If the target is in dim light or darkness, damage dice are maximized (no roll, take highest possible). Target gains Terrified condition for 2 rounds. Range: 30 ft.
ebon-annihilation.notes: Devastating finisher with maximized damage in darkness

nullify.name: Nullify

special: End one magical effect of School Level 2 or lower on a target or area
Higher level effects require an AST + MAG check against Difficulty 30 + (5 x School Level)

nullify.description: Reach into a spell's structure and tear out its foundation. Minor magic unravels at your touch. End one magical effect of School Level 2 or lower on a target or area within 30 ft. Higher level effects require an AST + MAG check against Difficulty 30 + (5 x School Level).

void-touch.name: Void Touch

special: If target has any active magical buffs, one is suppressed for 2 rounds

void-touch.description: Strike with a hand wreathed in emptiness. Where you touch, magic flickers and fades. 2D8 + AST Modifier. If target has any active magical buffs, one is suppressed for 2 rounds. Range: Touch.

spell-resistance.name: Spell Resistance
spell-resistance.description: Wrap yourself in a thin layer of nothingness that resists magical intrusion. Spells slide off you like water from oil. Caster gains +2 D20 on defensive rolls against magical attacks and abilities. Duration: 10 minutes.

counterspell.name: Counterspell

reactionTrigger.event: Enemy within 40 ft. uses a magical ability

special: Make an opposed AST + MAG roll
If you win, the ability fails and any components/resources are still expended

counterspell.description: As an enemy casts, you reach into the void between moments and pull their magic apart before it can fully form. When an enemy within 40 ft. uses a magical ability, make an opposed AST + MAG roll. If you win, the ability fails and any components/resources are still expended.

devour-magic.name: Devour Magic

conditionalBonus.condition: If the effect was School Level 3 or higher

special: End one magical effect within 30 ft
Caster heals 2D10 HP or restores 2D10 SY (choose when cast)
If effect was School Level 3 or higher, healing is doubled

devour-magic.description: Consume an active magical effect and convert its energy into sustenance for yourself. End one magical effect within 30 ft. Caster heals 2D10 HP or restores 2D10 SY (choose when cast). If the effect was School Level 3 or higher, healing is doubled.
devour-magic.notes: Can heal HP or restore SY

null-field.name: Null Field

special: Create a 15 ft. radius zone centered on self
No magical abilities can be activated within the zone
Active magical effects on creatures entering are suppressed while inside
The caster also cannot use magic while maintaining this field

null-field.description: Establish a zone where magic simply ceases to function. Spells cannot be cast within, and magical effects that enter are temporarily suppressed. Create a 15 ft. radius zone centered on self. No magical abilities can be activated within the zone. Active magical effects on creatures entering are suppressed while inside. The caster also cannot use magic while maintaining this field. Duration: 3 rounds. Caster cannot move while maintaining.

siphon-essence.name: Siphon Essence

special: Target loses resources: 2D6 from their primary magic resource (GM determines)
Caster regains 1 VS or heals 3D8 HP

siphon-essence.description: Drain the magical reserves from an enemy, leaving them hollow and weakened while you grow stronger. Target loses resources: 2D6 from their primary magic resource (GM determines). Caster regains 1 VS or heals 3D8 HP. Range: 30 ft.

absolute-void.name: Absolute Void

special: All magical effects in the area are permanently dispelled
All creatures in area take 4D12 damage (ignores all resistances)
All creatures lose all active magical buffs
Magical items in area are suppressed for 1 hour
Area remains a dead-magic zone for 1 minute

absolute-void.description: For one terrible moment, create a sphere of true nothingness, a point where reality itself does not exist. Magic, matter, and energy all cease within its boundaries. Create a 10 ft. radius sphere at a point within 40 ft. All magical effects in the area are permanently dispelled. All creatures in the area take 4D12 damage (ignores all resistances) and lose all active magical buffs. Magical items in the area are suppressed for 1 hour. The area remains a dead-magic zone for 1 minute.

fade.name: Fade

special: Enemies must pass a FRS check (Difficulty 30) to notice caster even when looking directly at them
Attacking or casting offensive magic ends the effect

fade.description: Let the void drink your presence. You do not turn invisible, you simply become unimportant, a thing the eye slides past without registering. Caster gains +3 D20 on stealth rolls. Enemies must pass a FRS check (Difficulty 30) to notice caster even when looking directly at them. Attacking or casting offensive magic ends the effect. Duration: 30 minutes.

muffle.name: Muffle

grants: Makes no sound from movement, speech, or equipment
special: Can still cast spells with verbal components (the sound exists but does not travel beyond 5 ft.)

muffle.description: Wrap sound in void-stuff, creating a pocket of silence around yourself. Footsteps make no noise; armor does not clink. Caster makes no sound from movement, speech, or equipment. Can still cast spells with verbal components (the sound exists but does not travel beyond 5 ft.). Duration: 1 hour.

void-sight.name: Void Sight

grants: Can see invisible creatures and objects

diceModifiers.applies: checks to detect hidden doors or traps

void-sight.description: Open your eyes to the spaces between. You perceive hidden things, illusions, and creatures attempting to conceal themselves. Caster can see invisible creatures and objects, see through magical illusions, and gains +2 D20 on checks to detect hidden doors or traps. Duration: 10 minutes.

veil-other.name: Veil Other

special: Grant one ally the effects of Fade for 30 minutes
If the ally attacks or casts offensive magic, only their concealment ends, yours remains

veil-other.description: Extend your concealment to an ally, wrapping them in the same emptiness that hides you. Grant one ally within touch range the effects of Fade for 30 minutes. If the ally attacks or casts offensive magic, only their concealment ends, yours remains.
veil-other.notes: Requires Fade ability; applies Fade to ally

false-face.name: False Face

special: Caster takes on the appearance and voice of a humanoid they have seen
Physical examination or FRS + KNW check (Difficulty 45) can detect the disguise

false-face.description: Shape shadows over your features to assume another's appearance. The disguise is perfect to mundane senses, only magic can pierce it. Caster takes on the appearance and voice of a humanoid they have seen. Physical examination or FRS + KNW check (Difficulty 45) can detect the disguise. Duration: 1 hour.

phase.name: Phase

grants: Can move through solid objects up to 5 ft. thick
special: Moving through living creatures deals 2D8 Sanity damage to them
Caster takes 1D10 Sanity damage each time they phase through an object

phase.description: Become partially unreal, allowing you to pass through solid matter as if it were thick fog. The experience is deeply unsettling. Caster can move through solid objects up to 5 ft. thick. Moving through living creatures deals 2D8 Sanity damage to them. Caster takes 1D10 Sanity damage each time they phase through an object. Duration: 3 rounds.

group-concealment.name: Group Concealment

special: Up to 5 willing targets within 15 ft. gain the effects of Fade for 30 minutes
If any member of the group attacks or casts offensive magic, only their concealment ends

group-concealment.description: Extend your mastery to hide an entire party within the void's embrace. All of you become shadows passing through an unaware world. Up to 5 willing targets within 15 ft. gain the effects of Fade for 30 minutes. If any member of the group attacks or casts offensive magic, only their concealment ends.

become-nothing.name: Become Nothing

grants: Completely undetectable by any means, mundane, magical, or divine
Cannot be seen, heard, smelled, or detected by any magical means including divination or true sight
Can move through all wards and barriers as if they did not exist
special: Cannot attack, cast offensive magic, or interact with physical objects without ending the effect

become-nothing.description: Surrender yourself completely to the void, becoming truly undetectable by any means, mundane, magical, or divine. You exist between moments, between spaces, between thoughts. Caster becomes completely undetectable. Cannot be seen, heard, smelled, or detected by any magical means including divination or true sight. Can move through all wards and barriers as if they did not exist. Cannot attack, cast offensive magic, or interact with physical objects without ending the effect. Duration: 1 hour or until voluntarily ended.
